mapper.select: select b.basket_no, b.user_id, b.cloth_no, c.cloth_name, c.price, c.discount_rate, b.basket_cnt from basket b INNER JOIN clothes c on b.cloth_no = c.cloth_no where b.user_id = #{userId} order by b.basket_no
select b.cloth_no, s.quantity, s.csize from basket b inner join stock s on b.cloth_no = s.cloth_no where b.cloth_no = #{clothNo}
mapper.delete: delete from basket where user_id = #{userId} and cloth_no = #{clothNo}
